infiniteScroll.enableAutoScroll.title: Enable Auto Scroll
infiniteScroll.enableAutoScroll.description: If checked, pages automatically load and display when the user reaches thebottom of the page, instead of offering a Load More Content button.

infiniteScroll.nextBtnText.title: Load More Content Label
infiniteScroll.nextBtnText.description: Sets the label for the load more content button.

infiniteScroll.prevBtnText.title: Load Previous Content Label
infiniteScroll.prevBtnText.description: Sets the label for the load previous content button.
